quotes.quote: In desperate position, you must fight
When matters are desperate we must put on a desperate face.
Desperate times call for desperate measures.
Mankind at its most desperate is often at its best.
Because I remember, I despair. Because I remember, I have the duty to reject despair.
When a man is in despair, it means that he still believes in something.
The desperate usually succeed because they have nothing to lose.
There is nobody more terrible than the desperate.
If you are curious, you will learn. If you are desperate, you will discover.
Desperation can make a person do surprising things.
A starving man won't notice a dirty plate.
Desperate ills need desperate remedies.
When things are desperate, there is no need to pretend that everything is beautiful.
Desperation is often more powerful than inspiration.
Desperation is like stealing from the Mafia: you stand a good chance of attracting the wrong attention.
Desperate times call for desperate analogies.
When one hits the bottom of the Desperation Barrel, there is always someone down there.
Sometimes that's all life is... One desperate act after another.
There are no desperate situations, there are only desperate people.
Life begins on the other side of despair.
When the situation is desperate, it is too late to be serious. Be playful.
Human beings do not readily admit desperation. When they do, the kingdom of heaven draws near.
Beware of desperate steps; the darkest day, lived till tomorrow, will have passed away.
Desperation is a necessary ingredient to learning anything, or creating anything. Period. If you ain't desperate at some point, you ain't interesting.
Tempt not a desperate man.
But desperation is the mother-in-law of invention.
But a desperate heart will seduce the mind.
Desperation makes men fearless.
Like carnivores to carnal pleasures as are we to desperate measures.
When they face desperation... human beings become animals.
Desperation is sometimes as powerful an inspirer as genius.
Despair makes victims sometimes victors.
A dog in desperation will leap over a wall.
Brilliance is born of Desperation.
The greatest inspiration is often born of desperation
That if desperate times call for desperate measures, then I'm free to act as desperately as I wish.
